title: LBHttpSolrServer constructor ignores passed in ResponseParser
description: The constructor on line 191 accepts a ResponseParser object, but it ignores it.  We should either drop that constructor or honor setting it.

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content: bulk fixing the version info for 4.0-ALPHA and 4.0 all affected issues have "hoss20120711-bulk-40-change" in comment

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content: removing fixVersion=4.0 since there is no evidence that anyone is currently working on this issue.  (this can certainly be revisited if volunteers step forward)

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content: Whoops - looks like we didn't see this when SOLR-4166 went in.
